mapper.insert: insert into book_goods(bookId, bookName, authorId, publeYear, publisher, cateCode, bookPrice, bookStock, bookDiscount, bookIntro, bookContents) values(seq_bookgoods_num.nextval, #{bookName}, #{authorId}, #{publeYear}, #{publisher}, #{cateCode}, #{bookPrice}, #{bookStock}, #{bookDiscount}, #{bookIntro}, #{bookContents})
